      • loadImageAsync

        public static void loadImageAsync(ImageView imageview,
                                  java.lang.String url,
                                  java.lang.String cacheLocalDir,
                                  Drawable defImg,
                                  int commpressWidth)
        Load image
        参数:
        imageview - Not null
        url - Not null
        cacheLocalDir - Default image cache directory
        defImg - Setting default image,Loader default image when result is null
        commpressWidth - >50
